overview: Gonzo auteur Jules Jordan prolongs the booty magic with the fifth installment in his Ass Worship series. Ass For Days takes up where the others left off - from the bottom. If you're into butts, you're in luck! As per his usual, Director Jules gets in on some of the fun himself, this time in a scene with newly christened redhead and super-vixen Tiffany Mynx. The action heats up from there with DPs, TPs, dildo shoves, sloppy facials, ball gags, and more.
title: Ass Worship 5
